name: H&H Management
description:
Dante Alighieri has been tasked by Heaven's and Hell's management to help them. A void has appeared in all 9 circles of hell, devouring the souls of those condemned and even bringing the souls of those who are supposed to be saved.

The game is just 10 levels and 1 Boss Fight. Please test and tell me if it is something you can consider attractive for a complete game.

The game was created for the

GameDev.tv 2022 Game Jam!

Planning if interesting concept to make it into a full game. Please leave any feedback, as it will be much appreciated.
